column5: Analyze current simulation data to identify new hire status issues
column6:
1. Query hire events from fct_yearly_events by year ✅
2. Trace new hire records through fct_workforce_snapshot pipeline ✅
3. Identify where employment_status becomes incorrect ✅
4. Document findings with SQL queries and data samples ✅
5. Create debugging dashboard/queries for validation ✅

column5: Fix employment status and classification logic for new hires
column6:
1. New hires without termination show detailed_status_code = new_hire_active ✅
2. New hires with termination show detailed_status_code = new_hire_termination ✅
3. Employment status correctly set to active for non-terminated new hires ✅
4. Year extraction logic works correctly for hire date comparisons ✅
5. All existing functionality remains intact (no regressions) ✅

column5: URGENT: Fix declining workforce (-7% to -12% annually instead of +3% growth)
column6:
1. Year-over-year active workforce growth matches 3% target (±0.5% tolerance) ❌
2. Cumulative growth calculation accounts for all previous year events ❌
3. Baseline workforce count correctly used for growth calculations ❌
4. Multi-year growth compounds correctly (not flat 3% each year) ❌
5. Growth validation tests pass for 5-year simulation ❌

column5: Review and fix workforce processing pipeline for consistent status
column6:
1. All CTEs in fct_workforce_snapshot maintain correct employment status
2. New hire records preserve hire dates and status through transformations
3. Status transitions (active → terminated) work correctly for all employees
4. Deduplication logic preserves most accurate employee record
5. Previous year workforce correctly carries over active employees only

column5: Create comprehensive test suite to validate simulation accuracy
column6:
1. dbt tests validate all expected status codes present each year
2. Growth rate validation tests ensure targets met (±0.5% tolerance)
3. Termination rate tests validate against configuration parameters
4. Data quality tests check for NULLs duplicates and invalid states
5. End-to-end simulation tests validate 5-year projection accuracy

column5: Build validation dashboard to monitor simulation accuracy
column6:
1. Real-time dashboard shows current simulation status by year
2. Workforce composition charts show all status categories
3. Growth rate tracking with target vs actual comparison
4. Termination rate monitoring with configuration benchmarks
5. Data quality indicators and validation status
